plot: Leslie and April clash over a proposed dog park, Ben receives a slew of job offers, and Andy uses his detective skills to find out who stole his computer.

Leslie vs. April - In this episode, April tries to build a dog park near Ann's house, but Ann counterattacks to avoid a "stinky dog poo pileup". Ben considers a new job at an accounting firm and Tom proves that he is serious about his Rent-a-Swag company.
